snippet: Comparing past and present versions of the print and digital New York Times to develop a design vocabulary and develop informed critiques of the look and layout.
abstract: Comparing past and present versions of the print and digital New York Times to develop a design vocabulary and develop informed critiques of the look and layout.

byline.original: By SHANNON DOYNE and HOLLY EPSTEIN OJALVO

headline.main: All the News That's Fit to Click: Analyzing New York Times Design
